sourcesContent:
Add Customer

Customer Name is required.
Customer Name must be at least 4 characters long.
Customer Email Id is required.
Customer Email Id must be at least 4 characters long.
Customer Contact Number is required.
Contact Number must be at least 10 digit and numbers only.
Contact Number must be 10 digit only.
Customer Address is required.
Address must be at least 4 characters long.
Username is required.
Username must be at least 4 characters long.
Password is required.
Password must be at least 4 characters long.
